alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:29PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of gusty showers will impact portions of Randolph, Pocahontas, southeastern Webster and southeastern Barbour Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1028 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkins, Marlinton, Cass Scenic Railroad, Greenbank, Mill Creek, Snowshoe, Dailey, Mingo, Beverly, Durbin, Hillsboro, Womelsdorf (Coalton), Huttonsville, Montrose, Harman, Laneville, Pheasant Run, Arbovale, Cheat Bridge and Dryfork. This includes Route 33 between mile markers 31 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster
